segments.text: That's the cutest little doll I've ever seen in my life !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Chill out . It's just Kenny from South Park .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What park ? You found a doll in a park ? Gross !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: South Park is a popular cartoon . You're so out of it , Jen
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , don't blame me ! I never get a chance to watch TV .
segments.speaker: S1
